In January, China was the centre of the virus outbreak and the EU helped with 50 tonnes of protective equipment.

Today, we are the centre of the coronavirus pandemic. We are ramping up our production and converting new production lines but this needs several weeks. China has not forgotten our help, and is ready to provide help, with N95 masks, surgical masks and testing kits. These can be shipped to Europe immediately.

This support is highly valued and we are grateful for it. ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³
